thread.title: All Your American Horror Story: Hotel Premiere Questions Answered
thread.title_full: All Your American Horror Story: Hotel Premiere Questions Answered - seattlepi.com

author: Sadie Gennis, TV GUIDE
title: All Your American Horror Story: Hotel Premiere Questions Answered
text:
A: Great question! Lachlan is played by Lyric Lennon , the 9-year-old son of O-Town member Ashley Parker Angel . Perhaps you watched his birth on the boy bander's MTV show There & Back .
So unbelievably proud to share with all of you that my son Lyric is going to be on the upcoming season of @AHSFX ! pic.twitter.com/1OEakt1SqU
- Ashley Parker Angel (@ParkerAngel) October 4, 2015 Q: Where is the rest of the cast?
A: You'll get to meet a lot of them in Episode 2, including Naomi Campbell as a Vogue editor, Finn Wittrock as male model Tristan Duffy and Evan Peters as Mr. March, the mass murderer who built the Cortez.
